feature - Adds privacyPolicyUrl config to enable developers to provide privacy policy URL. And shows Term of Service and Privacy Policy link on every screen for GDPR compliance.
feature - Defines the FirebaseUI externs.
feature - Defines the typescript definitions.
feature - Optimizes sign in flow to use updateCurentUser eliminating 2 RPCs in the process.
fixed - Catches errors that occur due to incompatible versions of firebase.js being used with firebaseui.js.
fixed - Fixes reCAPTCHA invisible badge which was getting hidden.
